front.title: ARC System Will Be Unavailable for Use During Thanksgiving Week

author.organization: Stanford Research Institute (SRI) International, Augmentation Research Center (ARC)

abstract.t: The ARC PDP-10 system will be unavailable for ARC and NIC users from Friday, November 17 (6:00 pm PST ) through Sunday, November 26. (10:00 pm PST).
